examples: I'm afraid this old radio is beyond repair.Radio reception isn't very good here.Every ship is required to radio its position.
恐怕这台旧收音机不能修了。这里的无线电接收情况不太好。要求每一艘船用无线电报告各自所在的位置。

translation: n. 铁轨；扶手；横杆；围栏vi. 抱怨；责骂vt. 铺铁轨；以横木围栏
examples: A towel hung from the rail.We installed a stainless steel towel rail on the wall.Nobody believes that he can jump over that rail.Hold on to the rail or you'll slip!The man was holding on the rail as he walked down the stairs.Passengers mustn't cross the rails.It's cheaper to ship goods by road than by rail.The goods have been consigned (to you) by rail.It is better to fight for good than to rail at the illHe used to rail at the volume of paper - work he had to do.He is always railing at his bad luck.She did not rail at her husband.Please help me to rail the garden.Hundreds of miles were railed out here.
栏杆上搭著条毛巾。我们在墙上装了一个不锈钢的挂毛巾的横杆。没人相信他能越过那个栏杆。抓住扶手，不然你会滑倒的。下楼梯时，这名男子一直紧抓着扶手。乘客不得横过铁路。公路运输比铁路运输便宜。货物已交由铁路发运(给贵方).与其抱怨,不如积善他以前老是因为不得不做大量的文牍工作而发牢骚。他老是抱怨自己运气不好。她没有责备丈夫。请帮我用栅栏把花园围起来。这里铺设了数百英里的铁路。

translation: n. （英）铁路；轨道；铁道部门vi. 乘火车旅行
examples: The railway lines run parallel to the road.It takes a lot of labour to build a railway.The goods were consigned to you by railway.
铁路线和那条道路平行。修筑一条铁路要花费许多劳动力。货物已由铁路托运到你处。

translation: n. 雨；下雨；雨天；雨季vi. 下雨；降雨vt. 大量地给；使大量落下n. (Rain)人名；(法)兰；(英)雷恩；(罗、捷)赖恩
examples: There will be rain in all parts of the country.The boys went for a walk despite of the rain.The rain beat against the windows.Too much rain accounted for the poor crop.There is plenty of rain this year.If it doesn't rain tomorrow, we'll have a picnic.It began to rain as soon as he left home.Tears rained down her cheeks.The suitcase burst open and its contents rained on the floor.
全国各地将有雨。尽管下雨，孩子们还是去散步。雨水拍打在窗户上。太多的雨水导致庄稼歉收。今年雨水充足。如果明天不下雨，我们就去野餐。他刚刚离开家就下起雨来。眼泪顺着她的面颊如雨点般落下。手提箱裂开了，里面的东西纷纷落在地板上。

translation: n. （美）雨衣
examples: He wasn't wearing his raincoat, he was carrying it over his arm.If I'd had the forethought to bring my raincoat, I wouldn't have got wet in the storm.She prepared for all possibilities by taking a sunhat, a raincoat and a woolly scarf.
他没穿着雨衣而是把它搭在胳膊上。我当初如果想到要带雨衣，便不会被暴风雨淋湿了。她带了太阳帽、 雨衣和毛围巾，一切有备无患。

translation: adj. 下雨的；多雨的n. (Rainy)人名；(英)雷尼
examples: Summer is a rainy season in China.I work both on sunny days and on rainy ones.The rainy weather made hay of our holiday plans.
在中国，夏天是一个多雨的季节。我风雨无阻地工作。我们的度假计划全给下雨天气破坏了。

translation: adv. 宁可，宁愿；相当int. 当然啦（回答问题时用）n. (Rather)人名；(英)拉瑟
examples: Poultry is rather cheap now.I would rather stay at home.I would rather fail than cheat in the examination.These shoes are rather too big.
现在的禽肉相当便宜。我宁可呆在家里。我宁愿考不及格，也不愿意考试作弊。这双鞋有点太大了。

translation: vi. 达到；延伸；伸出手；传开vt. 达到；影响；抵达；伸出n. 范围；延伸；河段；横风行驶n. (Reach)人名；(柬)列
examples: We had twenty miles to cover to reach the nearest railway station.He reached into his pocket to get his car keys.Hopefully, they will reach an agreement after the talk.We tried to reach them by cable.The garden reaches the lake.He tiptoed to reach the dictionary on the shelf.The plates on the upper shelf are beyond my reach.Such concepts are beyond the reach of my intelligence.The bridge is located over the upper reaches of the Thames.There are few women in the upper reaches of the civil service.
我们得走20英里的路才能到达最近的火车站。他把手伸进口袋里拿车钥匙。会谈之后,他们有望达成协议。我们试着用电报跟他们联络。花园一直延伸到湖边。他垫起脚去够书架上的字典。上层架子上的盘子我伸手拿不到。这样的概念以我的智慧是理解不了的。这座桥位于泰晤士河的上游。行政部门的上层机构中很少有女性任职。

translation: vt. 阅读；读懂，理解vi. 读；读起来n. 阅读；读物adj. 有学问的n. (Read)人名；(英)里德
examples: Only a few of the children there can read.Read the text slowly and deliberately.Every man is a volume if you know how to read him.Please read aloud so that I can hear you.I can read French but I can't speak it.Silence must not always be read as consent.I read a good article in today's paper.The marker reads "12 kilometres".Generally, the article reads very well.What does the thermometer read?A man came to read the gas meter.Do you read me?We advise the bank to amend the clause to read "partial shipment be permit".She read history as an undergraduate.My computer can't read the disk you sent.I was having a quiet read when the phone rang.His thrillers are always a gripping read.He is very widely read in law.

那里只有几个小孩识字。缓慢,有意的读全文。每一个人都是一卷书,只要你懂得如何阅读它。请大声朗读，好让我能听到。我能看懂法文但不会说。沉默不能总理解为同意。我在今天的报纸上读到了一篇好文章。只见标志上写着“12公里”，一般而言，这篇文章读起来很不错。温度计的读数是多少?有位男子来查过煤气表。你听得见我说的话吗？我们已通知银行将该条款改为“允许分批装船”。她在大学攻读历史我的电脑不能读你送来的盘。我在静静地看书，忽然电话铃响了。他的惊险小说向来引人入胜。他在法律方面知识渊博。

translation: adj. 准备好；现成的；迅速的；情愿的；快要…的n. 现款；预备好的状态adv. 迅速地；预先vt. 使准备好n. (Ready)人名；(英)雷迪
examples: The troops were ready for anything.The letter is ready for the post.I have no ready answer to the question.We are ready to render them assistance.I am ready to vouch for the truth of the report.
部队已做好了一切准备。信已准备好，可以寄出了。我没有现成的答案。我们乐意援助他们。我愿担保这一报导的真实性。

translation: adj. 实际的；真实的；实在的adv. 真正地；确实地n. 现实；实数n. (Real)人名；(德、西、葡、法)雷亚尔；(英)里尔
examples: Children believe that these characters are real.His face was drawn but the curtains were real.You will try some real Chinese cuisine this time.She never had any real friends at school.This machine is a real time-saver.The confusion arises because the real issues are hidden.That's the real part of Chicago.This year, the real estate industry continue to maintain rapid growth.I'm not real familiar with the areaYou and I must have lunch real soon.The real in us is silent; the acquired is talkative.
孩子们相信这些人物是真实的。他的脸是画的,但窗帘是真的。这次您将品尝正宗的中国菜。在学校，她从来没有交过真正的朋友。这部机器是一部名副其实的省时装置。因为实际的问题隐藏在后面，所以产生了困惑。那是芝加哥现实的一部分。今年以来,房地产业继续保持快速增长的态势。我不大熟悉这一带。你我必须尽快吃午饭。真实的自我沉默不语，后天的自我却喋喋不休。

translation: adv. 实际上，事实上；真正地，真实地；真的吗？（表语气）
examples: It's really cold today.It's really too bad that the teacher couldn't find someone to substitute for her when she was sick.Go ahead. Do whatever you really love.After the shock of their electoral defeat, the party really began to pull together.Did she really say so?They regard themselves as the best, and yet they don't really seem to have a clear strategy.
今天可真冷。她生病时,老师找不到人代替她,实在太遗憾了。去吧,去做你真正喜爱的事。该党在受到选举失败的打击之后，才真正地团结起来。她真的那样说吗？他们自认为是最好的,而事实上他们缺乏清晰的战略。

translation: vt. 收到；接待；接纳vi. 接收
examples: Neither John nor I am to receive the award.I was on vacation last week and didn't receive your fax.He was received as an honoured visitor.
约翰和我谁都不会接到奖赏。上星期我正在度假，没收到你们的传真。他以贵宾的身分受到款待。

translation: vt. 使再循环；使…重新利用vi. 重复利用n. 再生；再循环；重复利用
examples: We should try to recycle all our waste paper.One thing you can't recycle is wasted time.We should recycle the used things.We must recycle the cardboard boxes.We should recycle garbage, not burn it.We should recycle glass from old bottles.The industry is recycling paper.The ecological system can recycle by itself.Water recycle is a good way to save our resources.
我们应该把所有废纸回收再利用。唯一无法回收利用的是你浪费掉的时间。我们应回收利用旧东西。我们必须循环使用纸盒子。我们应该循环利用垃圾，而不是焚烧。我们要利用旧瓶再制玻璃。这个工厂正在再制纸。生态系统本身就可以循环。水循环利用是一种很好的节约资源的方法。

translation: n. 红色，红颜料；赤字adj. 红色的；红肿的，充血的n. (Red)人名；(英、德)雷德
examples: I received a bunch of red roses on my birthday.The dying fire was throwing out a dull red light.Red squirrels are now very rare in Britain.The sky slowly changed from blue to red.
生日那天，我收到一束红玫瑰。将要熄灭的火发出暗红色的光。红色的松鼠在英国已十分罕见了。天空慢慢由蓝色变为红色。

translation: n. 垃圾；废物vt. 拒绝；不愿；抵制vi. 拒绝
examples: I refuse to answer that question.We were refused permission to enter.There is a refuse dump out of the town.The council is responsible for refuse collection.
我不愿回答那个问题。我们被拒之门外。镇外有个垃圾场。市政局负责清除垃圾废物。

translation: n. 注意；尊重；问候；凝视vt. 注重，考虑；看待；尊敬；把…看作；与…有关vi. 注意，注重；注视n. (Regard)人名；(西、意)雷加德；(法)勒加尔
examples: The artist was highly regarded.I regard reading as a form of recreation.He regards the bad weather as a prognostic of failure.He regarded the famous scientist with worship in his eyes.Mary regarded the photo intently.He seldom regards my advice.That does not regard me.No one showed the least regard for his feelings.I have done that out of regard for my sister.We have a great regard for the advanced workers.John is a pilot held in high regard.You should pay more regard to safety on the roads.If you should see him, please give him my regards.Give my best regards to your parents.The skyscraper have been built with no regard for us.
这位艺术家非常受尊敬。我把看书当作一种消遣的形式。他将坏天气视为失败的预兆。他以敬慕的目光注视着这位著名科学家。玛丽专心地注视着那张照片。他很少考虑我的建议。那和我无关。根本没有人关心他的感受。我这样做是出于对我妹妹的关心。我们非常尊敬先进工作者。约翰是一位深受尊敬的飞行员。你应该多注意交通安全。如果你见到他，请代我向他致意。代我向你的父母致意。摩天大楼的兴建丝毫不考虑我们的利益。

translation: adj. 相对的；有关系的；成比例的n. 亲戚；相关物；[语] 关系词；亲缘植物
examples: Motion is absolute while stagnation is relative.They are now living in relative comfort.Relative to the size, the city is sparsely populated.The teacher asked me some questions relative to my paper.He showed such concern that people took him to be a relative.
运动是绝对的,而静止是相对的。他们现在过着比较安逸的生活。与其面积相比, 这个城市的人口是稀少的。老师问了我一些和我的论文有关的问题。他很关心别人，因而大家都把他当作亲人。

translation: vi. 转播；接替n. [电] 继电器；接替，接替人员；驿马vt. 转播；使接替；分程传递
examples: Images of the war were relayed around the world.I will relay your opinion to the headmaster.The Relay Agent could not start up its main thread.Frame Relay Connection and Traffic Flow Control.The anchor man in a relay team runs last.Our Torch Relay will break new ground.This relay connects one input to one output.Six teams competed in yesterday's relay race.The anchor man in a relay team runs last.A new relay of horses was harnessed to the cart.
世界各地转播了战争的图像。我愿把你的意见转告校长。中继代理无法启动其主线程。帧中继连接和流量控制。接力队中的主力跑最后一棒。我们的火炬接力将开创新局面。该继电器将一个输入连接到一个输出。六个队参加了昨天的接力赛。接力队中的主力跑最后一棒。用作轮换的马都已套到了那辆马车上。

translation: vt. 记得；牢记；纪念；代…问好vi. 记得，记起
examples: I remember his objecting to the scheme.Remember to write us when you get there.I'm sorry, I can't remember your name.I really can't remember what you said last night.I shall always remember your kindness to us.That was a beautiful summer, as I remember.Please remember me to your family.
我记得他曾经反对该计划。到了那儿别忘了给我们写信。对不起，我想不起你的名字了。我确实记不得你昨天晚上说了什么。我将永远记住你对我们的好。记忆中,那是一个美丽的夏日。请代我问候你的家人。

translation: vi. 修理；修复vt. 修理；恢复；补救，纠正n. 修理，修补；修补部位
examples: She turned the chair on its side to repair it.I'll have my watch repaired; it doesn't work.The overcoat is so old, it won't repair.How can I repair the wrong I have done her?The majority of the damage is easy to repair.The brickwork in this house is in need of repair.He sent his car to the garage for repair.I'm afraid this old radio is beyond repair.
她把椅子翻转过来修理。我得修修表，它不走了。这件大衣太旧了，不能修补了。我冤枉了她，怎样才能补救呢？这次的损害大部分容易补救。这所房子的砖造需要修理。他把汽车送到修车厂修理。恐怕这台旧收音机不能修了。

translation: vi. 回答；[法] 答辩；回击n. 回答；[法] 答辩vt. 回答；答复
examples: What a sage reply you gave!He gave me no chance to reply to his question.I'm rather hazy about how to reply.It's very odd that she didn't reply to our letter.It is odd that they did not reply our letter.She is the only person who reply to the invitation.He disdained to reply to the insult.Thank you for your prompt reply to our telegram.His evasive reply prompted me to ask him another question.The softness of his reply calmed her down.She sneered her contempt for his reply.The telegram asked for an instant reply.
多聪明的回答啊！他没有给我回答他问题的机会。我不清楚如何回答。她没有回我们的信是件很奇怪的事。他们没有给我们回信，这真奇怪。她是唯一对邀请做了回应的人。他不屑于理会那侮辱。多谢您对我们电报的即刻答复。他闪烁其词的回答促使我提出又一个问题。他温和的回答使她冷静下来。她对他的回答嗤之以鼻。这封电报要求立即回覆。

translation: n. 报告；报道；成绩单vt. 报告；报导；使报到vi. 报告；报到；写报导n. (Report)人名；(匈)雷波特
examples: He is reading a report of the state of the roads.I have only reports to go on.My son got an excellent report last semester.The tyre burst with a loud report.I shall have to report this to the authorities.The crash happened seconds after the pilot reported engine trouble.The press in China widely reported the event.She reported (her) having seen the gunman.You should have reported them to the police.It is time to report back for work.All representatives report (directly) to the sales department.
他正在看一篇关于道路状况的报告。我的依据只是谣传而已。我儿子上学期成绩出色。轮胎砰的一声巨响爆裂了。我得把这事向当局报告。飞行员报告发动机有故障后几秒钟飞机就坠毁了。中国报界广泛报导了此事。她叙述说曾看见那持枪歹徒。你应当向警方控告他们的。是回去报到上班的时候了。所有营业代表均须向销售部(直接)承担责任。

translation: vt. 使休息，使轻松；把…寄托于n. 休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架vi. 休息；静止；依赖；安置n. (Rest)人名；(英、德、俄、捷、荷)雷斯特
examples: We'll eat some of the bread and keep the rest for breakfast.You look tired. You need a good rest.A rest shall be placed at the end of a row of books to keep them upright.When the song came to a rest, she paused for a while.It would be nice to sit down and rest for a while.Rest the ladder against the wall.His chin rested on his hands.His brown eyes rested on her for a moment.The original manuscript rests in the museum.How could a country rest its security on such promises?The whole argument rests on a false assumption.He urged the council not to let the matter rest.She was laid to rest beside her late husband.
我们将吃一点面包，剩下的留到早饭时吃。你看来累了。你需要好好休息一下。一排书的末端应放个支撑物以使书本保持直立。唱到了休止符的时候，她停顿了一下。坐下来休息一会儿是很好的。把梯子靠在墙上吧。他双手托着下巴。他的棕色眼睛盯着她看了一会儿。原始手稿在博物馆里。一个国家怎么能让自己的安全依赖这类诺言呢?整个论点都是基于一个错误的假设。他敦促委员会不要对这个问题不了了之。她被安葬在亡夫的墓旁。

translation: n. 餐馆；[经] 饭店
examples: This restaurant gets three stars in the guidebook.There are many streamers in front of the restaurant.I had my breakfast in the small restaurant.The quality of service in this restaurant has improved a lot.
这家餐馆在旅游指南中标有三颗星。饭店门前有许多长条旗。我在一家小饭馆里吃了早饭。这个饭店的服务质量已经有了很大改善。

translation: n. 结果；成绩；答案；比赛结果vi. 结果；导致；产生
examples: These problems are the result of years of bad management.The presumable result is an election defeat.She looked with pride at the result of her work.If you cube 10, the result is 1000.He is indifferent to the result of the exam.We desperately need a result from this match.If this football team doesn't get a result tonight, they will be put down into a lower division.If law and order break down, anarchy will result.These toxic blooms result from changes in the ocean water.The accident resulted in the death of two passengers.
这些问题是由于多年管理不善而造成的。推测结果是竞选可能会失败。她自豪地看着自己的工作成果.十自乘两次,结果为一千。他对考试结果漠不关心。这场比赛我们务必获胜。如果今晚这支足球队不能赢球，他们将会被降级。法治一垮，就会出现无政府状态。这些有毒的菌绒由于海水的变化而产生。这起事故导致两名乘客丧生。

translation: vt. 返回；报答vi. 返回；报答n. 返回；归还；回球adj. 报答的；回程的；返回的
examples: We must return to Dalian within three days.What time does your husband return from work?Don't forget to return my keys.Good education is an investment for your future and will return substantial rewards.He neglected to return his income tax form.I'm afraid I have to insist on the return of my books at once.The hope of his safe return diminished as time passed by.I gave him some books in return for his assistance.He assist me with my income tax return.
我们必须在3日内回到大连。你丈夫什么时候下班回家？别忘了还我钥匙。接受优质教育是对自己未来的投资并会获得高回报投资。他忽略了所得税表格的申报。对不起,我要求你立即归还我的书。随着时间的推移,他平安返回的希望越来越渺茫。我给了他一些书,作为对他所提供的帮助的回报。他帮助我填写所得税申报单。

translation: n. 回顾；复习；评论；检讨；检阅vt. 回顾；检查；复审vi. 回顾；复习功课；写评论
examples: Before the examination we have a review of the term's work.A succinct review of this problem with an excellent bibliography has recently appeared.Perhaps we need a quick review of what we've gone through so far.Implementation of this phase is under review subject to the finalisation of the statutory plan.This document defines an overall peer review process.On the square, the commander reviewed the powerful and grandiose guard of honor.The commander is sitting in front of the rostrum, waiting to review the troops.He promised to review the film in one of the evening papers.Even if you are one of the best students in the class, in order to maintain your grades you must review your lessons often.They review their lessons night after night.Whether the authorities will review if the uniforms for disciplined services officers are suited to different weather conditions?Sometimes he reviewed for the principal papers.

考试之前，我们复习一学期的功课。关于这个问题的一个简明的复习和一份极好的文献目录最近已发表。或许我们应很快地回顾一下我们前一段时间的工作。当局现正检讨这期工程的实施，检讨结果视乎拟定法定图则的工作而定。该文档定义了一个全面的同行评审过程。首长在广场上检阅了威武雄壮的仪仗队。指挥员坐在主席台前, 等待着检阅部队。他答应在一家晚报上评论这部电影。即使你是班上最好的学生之一,要保住成绩也得常常温习功课才行。他们每夜都温习功课。当局会不会检讨纪律部队人员的制服是否适合各种天气情况?他有时为各大报写些评论文章。

translation: n. 稻；米饭vt. 把…捣成米糊状n. (Rice)人名；(瑞典)里瑟；(塞)里采；(英)赖斯
examples: Rice is our essential foodstuff in life.His plate was piled high with rice.He had some rice for supper.Rice yields will be higher than last year.
大米是我们生活的基本食物。他的盘子里盛满了米饭。晚饭时他吃了一些米饭。稻产量将高于去年。

translation: adj. 富有的；肥沃的；昂贵的adj. 油腻的，含有很多脂肪n. (Rich)人名；(丹)里克；(捷)里赫；(英、西)里奇；(葡、法)里什
examples: He is a rich man.The rich man left his son nothing in the will.Our country is a rich land.He has gained rich experience in these years.Her rich experience gave her an advantage over other applicants for the job.
他是一个富有的人。那位富翁在遗嘱中什么都没给他儿子留下。我们是一个富饶的国家。这些年来，他取得了丰富的经验。她丰富的经验使她比其他求职者具有有利条件。

translation: vt. 解谜；给...出谜；充满于n. 谜语；粗筛；谜一般的人、东西、事情等vi. 出谜n. (Riddle)人名；(英)里德尔
examples: That painting is still a riddle to us.He could not solve the riddle.He got the answer to the riddle as quick as a flash.The riddle was at last unriddled.She loved to riddle out the solution to problems.The door was riddled with shots.Stay where you are,or I'll riddle you with bullet holes.His daily work is to riddle coal cinders to get out the larger pieces.
那幅画对我们仍然是个谜。他猜不出这个谜。他一下子就猜中了谜底。这个谜语终于得到了解答。她喜欢解答问题。门被子弹打得尽是窟窿。不要乱动，不然我就把你打得满身是弹孔。他每天的工作是用粗筛筛煤渣，将大块的煤渣挑出来。

translation: vi. 骑马；乘车；依靠；漂浮vt. 骑；乘；控制；（骑马、自行车等）穿越；搭乘；飘浮n. 骑；乘坐；交通工具；可供骑行的路；（乘坐汽车等的）旅行；乘骑；（乘车或骑车的）短途旅程；供乘骑的游乐设施n. （英）赖德（人名）；（法、葡）里德（人名）
examples: She hasn't been out riding since the accident.I can ride a bicycle, and I can drive a car, but I can not ride a horse.You'll never learn to ride a bicycle if you don't practise.It's a ten-minute ride on the bus.This balloon ride is incredible.A park and ride network will allow private vehicles to also act as feeders to the rail system.I want to have a ride of that bike.It's only a 5-minute bus-ride to the park.The luxury model gives a smoother ride.He hitched a ride to the station.
她自从出了事故以后，一直没有骑马外出过。我会骑自行车，而且我会开汽车。但我不会骑马。如果你不练习,就学不会骑自行车。乘公共汽车要用十分钟。这次乘气球旅行简直令人难以置信。泊车转乘网络将有助于私家车成为接驳铁路的交通工具。我想骑一骑那辆自行车。坐公共汽车去公园仅需5分钟。坐这种豪华型汽车感觉很平稳。他搭便车到车站去。

translation: adj. 正确的；直接的；右方的vi. 复正；恢复平稳n. 正确；右边；正义adv. 正确地；恰当地；彻底地vt. 纠正n. (Right)人名；(英)赖特
examples: In general, I think we're on the right track.After some introspection, I think you are right.The bus station is on the right side.She is the right girl for me; I need no one else.He has seen with all the right people in all the right places.He made me look a right idiot.We had taken a wrong turning,but a policeman put us right.The chicken will come right out and demand food if you don't feed them.When you get to the fork of the road, turn right.When he took a quick glance at the lady, he was surprised to find that she was right regarding him with interest.He is ill. Please send for a doctor right away.The icy wind blew right through me.I have the right to ask for an explanation.The property belongs to her as of right.Everyone supported him because he was in the right.He sat on the left, and she sat on the right.The Right dominated the cabinet and kept elbowing out the Left.I had to right the picture before I could feel comfortable.Give me one more chance to right my mistakes, please.We right everyone, no matter who he or she is.You have to right what you have done one day.The gymnast righted after jumping onto the ground with a somersault.

总的看来,我想我们走的路子是正确的。经过了自省后,我认为你是对的。公共汽车站在右边。她就是我要找的女孩,我不要其他人。他在所有的正式场合都遇见了一些重要人士。他让我看起来完全是个傻瓜。我们转错了弯,但有一位警察给我们指出了正确的方向。你要是不给小鸡喂食,它们会直接跑来要吃的。你走到这条路的分岔口时他匆匆看了那个女人一眼,惊讶地发现她正好也在饶有兴趣地看着他。他病了,请快去请个医生来。冰冷的风直吹向我。我有权要求一个解释。这财产按理说是属于她的。大家都支持他,因为他是正确的。他坐在左边,她坐在右边。右派占据了政府内阁中的大多数,并不断排挤左派人士。我得把这幅画扶正才能感到舒服。请再给我一次机会纠正错误吧。我们公正地对待每个人,不管他（她）是谁。总有一天你要为你的所作所为付出代价。那个体操运动员翻了个筋斗跳到地面上,保持住了平衡。

translation: 右翼；右派
examples: The right opposes the new taxes.They attacked the enemy's right wing.
右翼反对征收新税。他们攻击敌人的右翼。

translation: vi. 按铃；敲钟；回响；成环形n. 戒指；铃声，钟声；拳击场；环形物vt. 按铃；包围；敲钟；套住n. (Ring)人名；(英、西、德、匈、瑞典、芬)林
examples: She wears a wedding ring to show that she's married.Roger made the rope fast to the metal ring.Adenine has a purine ring structure.The children sat in a ring round the teacher.In the finals of the boxing championship he knocked out his opponent, who was carried out of the ring.The horses trotted around the circus ring.The officer was suspected of involvement in an international drug ring.There was a ring at the door.We ring in the mew year with the church bells.The first bell started to ring,and then the others chimed in.Please give me a ring after class.His voice carries the ring of authority.Ring the correct answer with your pencil.A high fence ringed the prison camp.The village is pocketed in a ring of hills.Zinc and copper handle with copper head,rubber ring.Ask her to ring me up if you should see her.If you need anything, just ring for the attendant.My husband's last words are still ringing in my ears.The playground rang with children's shouts.The music was so loud it made my ears ring.In case of fire ring the bell.The policeman felt that my story didn't ring true.

她戴着结婚戒指，表示她已结婚。罗杰把绳子牢牢地拴在金属环上。腺嘌呤具有嘌呤环的结构。孩子们围着老师坐成一圈。在拳击锦标赛决赛中,他把对手击昏在地,后者被人抬出了拳击台。马绕着马戏场小跑。那个警察被怀疑卷入一个国际贩毒集团。门铃响了。我们用教堂的钟声迎来了新年。第一个钟声响起，其他钟接着奏出和谐的乐声。下课后,请给我打个电话。他的声音中带有权威的口气。用铅笔圈出正确的答案。有一道高高的铁丝网围着战俘营。这座村庄四周山峦环绕。锌合金，铜手柄，铜镀铬环绕橡塑叩诊头。你万一见到她,请让她给我打电话。如果您要什么，就按铃叫服务员。丈夫的临终遗言还在我耳边回响。游戏场上到处都是儿童的喊叫声。音乐的声音太大了，把我耳朵震得直响。万一起火,请按铃。警察认为我讲的话听起来不可信。

translation: 环形公路
examples: The capital has an inner ring road.
那个城市有一条内环路。

translation: n. 河，江n. (River)人名；(英)里弗
examples: The guide led us to the river.Growing along the river are tall palm trees.Navigation is difficult on this river because of the hidden rocks.The bridge stands majestic astride the river.The river fed into a lake.The Changjiang River is one of the longest rivers in the world.The current strengthened as we moved down the river.The villagers diverted the river from its course to a new channel.This species of fish successfully transferred to that river through a watercourse.
向导带领我们到河边。沿着这条河生长的是高大的棕树。因为河上有暗礁，所以在这条河上航行很困难。大桥巍然横跨在江上。这条河流入一个湖泊。长江是世界上最长的河流之一。我们顺流而下时，水流更急了。村民们将河流改道使其进入新水道。这种鱼成功地通过一条水道到了那条河流。

translation: n. 公路，马路；道路；手段vt. （狗）沿臭迹追逐（猎物）adj. （美）巡回的n. (Road)人名；(英)罗德
examples: A fall of rocks blocked the road.The road was blocked by a huge rock.The rough road made the car vibrate.This is the high road to democracy.We cleared a few things up, so now we are on the right road to recovery.
掉落的岩石把路封住了。道路被一块大石头堵住了。崎岖不平的道路使车颠簸得很厉害。这是通向民主的直接途径。我们弄清了一些事情，所以现在我们能采取正确的方法来康复。”

translation: vt. 抢劫；使…丧失；非法剥夺vi. 抢劫；掠夺
